mapper.insert: INSERT INTO house ( building_id, house_number, layout, area, inner_area, floor, total_floor, orientation, decoration, house_type, price, status, owner_price, description, agent_id, is_valid, created_at, updated_at, created_by, updated_by ) VALUES ( #{buildingId}, #{houseNumber}, #{layout}, #{area}, #{innerArea}, #{floor}, #{totalFloor}, #{orientation}, #{decoration}, #{houseType.code}, #{price}, #{status.code}, #{ownerPrice}, #{description}, #{agentId}, #{isValid}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedBy} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, building_id, house_number, layout, area, inner_area, floor, total_floor, orientation, decoration, house_type, price, status, owner_price, description, agent_id, is_valid, created_at, updated_at, created_by, updated_by FROM house WHERE id = #{id} AND is_valid = 1

SELECT id, building_id, house_number, layout, area, inner_area, floor, total_floor, orientation, decoration, house_type, price, status, owner_price, description, agent_id, is_valid, created_at, updated_at, created_by, updated_by FROM house WHERE building_id = #{buildingId} AND is_valid = 1
ORDER BY house_number ASC
